title: Developer
description: Recent Wyncode graduate, now seeking a full time role as a Full Stack Developer. During my time at Wyncode, I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript with libraries such as jQuery and React, Ruby with Ruby on Rails framework and Postgres. I was also exposed to Agile methodologies, Test Driven Development using Rspec and Capybara, along with Express for Node.js. I am excited to learn, advance my skills, and start a new career!

title: Mixologist
description: Designing cocktails in Wynwood, FL since 2015 through spirit knowledge, preparation of house-made syrups, liquor infusions, and other ingredients to create quality drinks. *BarSmarts Certified
